x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
Enables IT departments to measure and reduce their carbon emissions, supporting corporate
sustainability goals.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: IT operations consume significant energy, but teams lack visibility into the carbon footprint of their assets and activities.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: GreenOps ITSM – Measuring IT Carbon Impact
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Integrate sustainability metrics into the ServiceNow ITSM dashboard, where each CI (server, device,
etc.) includes energy consumption data. Incidents or changes could calculate environmental cost
impacts.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

ITSM
CMDB
ESG Management module
Performance Analytics

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Standardizing environmental impact data and ensuring accurate measurement across regions.
